apps.name: Sentiment
apps.description: Web app which determines the sentiment of users that tweet using a given hashtag.

apps.name: Attender
apps.description: Attendance taking application aimed towards college classes, integrating with Blackboard and Canvas. (WIP)

apps.name: Let's Heal STL
apps.description: Website made for poetry and art book published after the Fergusson tragedy.

bots.name: Movie of the Day
bots.description: Discord bot created to suggest user-submitted movies.

bots.name: Stills Bot
bots.description: Discord bot to collect stills posted from @OnePerfectShot on Twitter, relaying it to a channel.

bots.name: Music Bot
bots.description: Discord bot that plays user suggested songs and playlists in a voice channel.
